## Progress

In this section, you will find resources to progress your understanding to an exam-level:

-   Crucial points

-   Exercises - Level 2 (and full worked solutions)

-   Online self-marked assessment

### Crucial points

These provide (ahem.) crucial points for the topic. These could be key things to remember or common mistakes made in the topic.

### Exercises

In the progress section, you will find the Level 2 exercise and full worked solutions. These questions are designed to be at an exam level and include more application elements to the questions.

### Online test

Every chapter of every topic has a self-marking test. These question have been written to an exam level and will encourage you to think your way through them. **We recommend writing all of your working on paper before submitting your final answer.**
